definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: All usage rights will be fully owned by our company.
sentences.chinese: 所有的使用权将完全归本公司。

sentences.english: The minor property house problems reflect the land use right of the Circulation.
sentences.chinese: 小产权房问题最终反映的是宅基地使用权的流转问题。

sentences.english: Village leaders can arbitrarily "readjust" land rights at a moment's notice.
sentences.chinese: 村干部可以随时随地任意“重新调整”土地使用权。

sentences.english: Who owns the group name in case of dispute?
sentences.chinese: 万一散团的话谁拥有团名的使用权？

sentences.english: Fireplace is renowned internationally for its trademark in China the right to use.
sentences.chinese: 拥有国际知名壁炉商标在中国地区的使用权。

sentences.english: The user can have above-mentioned right to use after the affirmation of the identity.
sentences.chinese: 使用者通过了身份的确认后，即可具有上述使用权。

sentences.english: And two teachers scuffled over whether they could share one of the half-dozen tables in the room.
sentences.chinese: 而两外两名教师则为屋内一张桌子的使用权展开混战。

sentences.english: Third, ways to obtain land use right transfer, transfer fees can be paid sub.
sentences.chinese: 以出让方式获得土地使用权，出让金可分段支付。

sentences.english: Such access still would be subject to the friend's privacy and application settings.
sentences.chinese: 这种使用权仍以朋友的隐私和程序设置为条件。

sentences.english: The second part is the history of the construction of land-use rights to remise by auction.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，拍卖出让建设用地使用权的历史沿革。

sentences.english: The acquisition of housing land use right should be defined in details in legislation.
sentences.chinese: 农村宅基地使用权的取得需要通过立法进一步完善。

sentences.english: Land-use right to life is generally 70 years.
sentences.chinese: 土地使用权的生命通常是70岁。

sentences.english: A contract dispute on granting land-use right resulting from the factory house requisitioned in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010年，厂房拆迁中土地使用权出让合同纠纷案。

sentences.english: Ownership has been described as "the entirety of powers of use and disposal allowed by law".
sentences.chinese: 所有权被称作是䏰“法定使用权和处置权的集合体。”

sentences.english: We sell patent right and usufruct of RIAF, and provide tech support.
sentences.chinese: 出售专利权，使用权，并提供技术支持。

sentences.english: When you run your tests, you can then use the weight to distribute your results.
sentences.chinese: 当您运行测试时，您可以使用权重来分配您的结果。

definition: to lease/to hire/to rent (sth from sb)
to provide (an asset) as security for a loan/to put up collateral
